chapters.title: Chapter 19: Diamonds and Stars
chapters.info: Faeldrin Harella, p. 336 (425)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She grew up in Tarabon. She was part of Salidar's embassy to Rand. She has dark hair that she usually keeps in thin braids. She shares a room with Merana, Masuri, and Seonid in the palace.
